scripts.audit:all: yarn audit && yarn workspaces run audit:all
scripts.audit:runtime: yarn audit --groups dependencies && yarn workspaces run audit:runtime
scripts.version: yarn workspace @jaspersoft/jv-ui-components version --new-version $npm_package_version --no-git-tag-version && yarn workspace @jaspersoft/jv-tools version --new-version $npm_package_version --no-git-tag-version && yarn workspace @jaspersoft/jv-input-controls version --new-version $npm_package_version --no-git-tag-version && yarn workspace @jaspersoft/jv-scheduler version --new-version $npm_package_version --no-git-tag-version && yarn workspace demo-input-controls version --new-version $npm_package_version --no-git-tag-version && yarn workspace demo-scheduler version --new-version $npm_package_version --no-git-tag-version
